A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a bad movie in so many ways. Rian Johnson must really think he is cool to do all of the lame things he did in this movie. Bad humor\, made Hux a joke\, BB8 a joke\, Pasma a joke\, Poe a joke\, Snoke a joke\, Luke a joke. i like Rey but she  is not challenged in anyway again! Even a number of fans that liked the movie did not like the Canto Blight story. Also I am not a hardcore Star Wars fan\, EU fan\, troll\, bot\, racist\, sexisxt\, or against social injustist. I am a person who likes to watch movies and I did not like this one.
